section.p: You take the Book of the Seven Sages to Pyletes the Sage at the Gold Dust Tavern. He thanks you effusively for bringing it to him. Your reward is secret learning from the temple of Molhern, god of knowledge. Add 1 to the ability of your choice. Also gain the title Illuminate of Molhern - write this in the Titles and Honours box on your Adventure Sheet. Lose the codeword Artefact and cross off the Book of the Seven Sages.
